title: White House staff in turmoil after another messy exit
text:
White House staff in turmoil after another messy exit   02:12 
A White House staffer resigning over allegations that he abused two of his ex-wives is simply the latest in a series of headline-making departures from the White House.   
A White House staffer resigning over allegations that he abused two of his ex-wives is simply the latest in a series of headline-making departures from the White House.  //reut.rs/2ExkU5X
